title: b) That, respecting the Public Transit Infrastructure Fund Phase One Transfer Payment Agreement (“PTIF Agreement”) between the Province of Ontario and the City of Peterborough authorized by Council by By-law 17-044 dated May 25, 2017, the Mayor and Clerk are authorized, both retroactively and on a go forward basis, to execute agreements to amend the PTIF Agreement on terms acceptable to the Commissioner of Infrastructure and Planning Services and in forms acceptable to the City Solicitor; and c) That, as a matter of housekeeping, the Public Transit Infrastructure Fund (PTIF) funding of $207,000 be reallocated from the Transit Garage Replacement Study Project (2022 Capital Budget Project 5-16.02) to the Transit Stops and Shelter Project (2020 Capital Budget Project 5-11.04) as outlined in Table 1 – PTIF Funding Reallocation.
That this meeting adjourn at 5:34 p.m.
